basic_information.scholarship_name: Dr. Donald E. Fleming Endowed Scholarship

description: The Dr. Donald E. Fleming Endowed Scholarship is open to declared Finance majors who are enrolled full-time. Students must have completed at least 74 hours at the time of their application and begin their senior year in fall 2024 (i.e., senior standing = 90 hours earned). The student must demonstrate significant scholastic achievement. The student must demonstrate participation in significant campus activities showing leadership abilities and potential for achievement in the business world. Eligibility Requirements Declared Finance majors Enrolled full-time Completed at least 74 hours Beginning senior year in fall 2024 Senior standing - must have completed at least 90 hours Demonstrate significant scholastic achievement Demonstrate participation in significant campus activities showing leadership abilities and potential for achievement in the business world Selection Process Students must have a desire to be successful in the business world with a promise of future career success
